settings.text: Our Women's Hiking Leggings and Sweatpants are made from 100% Royal Alpaca Wool. Wool bottoms are perfect for hiking, skiing, running or any other activities in nature or in the city. Our wool bottoms and base layers keep you cool in summer and protect you from the cold in winter. Alpaca wool is breathable, moisture-wicking and temperature regulating, which makes it the ideal material for high-performance activities. Wherever your adventures take you, make sure to stay comfortable all day long with alpaca wool leggings or joggers.
